# City Hall

## HOURS

City Hall is open 8AM to 5PM Monday through Friday, typically closed during the lunch hour 12PM-1PM. 

City Hall is closed on most holidays.

 

## CITY COUNCIL AND MAYOR

City Council is held the first and third Tuesday of Every Month at City Hall. City Council starts at 7PM and ends when all business is concluded. The Public is welcome and invited to attend.

Mayor - Michael Christensen

Councilmember - Stanton Fanning

Councilmember - Perla Garcia

Councilmember - Hector Rodriguez

Councilmember - Ryan Piercy

Councilmember - Rick Kannely

 

## STAFF

Deputy Clerk - Sherrie Rodriguez

Finance Director - Janice Flynn

Public Works Director - Curt Carpenter

Public Works - Mauricio Romero

Public Works - Brent Flinn

Public Works - Jeremy Garnick

## Conserve Water

It's our most precious natural resource.  Every drop counts...

![Farmers market](https://www.royalcitywa.org/images/promos_mi/mi_2_farmersmarketfoodprototype.jpg)

## Shop Local

Shopping local sustains our community and supports local merchants.  A win-win for all!
